entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TemporalAll for temporal owned entities mapped to parent table. #29156
  • AsNoTracking() performs partial identity resolution #29152
  • Index incorrectly named in migration #29151
  • Database.EnsureCreated() force create multiple schemas #29144
  • Support using a single sproc per concrete type regardless of the inheritance mapping strategy #29143
    Backlog
  • Owned Entity throws InvalidOperationException inside RelationalSqlTranslatingExpressionVisitor.TryRewriteEntityEquality #29142
  • How to use EF Core in applications targeting .NET Framework 4.8 after EF Core 3.1 end of support? #29136

Closed

  • Query: Reduce indentation in SqlTranslator #28098
    MQ
  • CLI dbscaffold not correctly scaffolding many-to-many relationships #29101
  • EFCore's error handling is useless and leads to loss of productivity and frustration! #29034
  • Synapse database first approach - FUNCTION OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME not supported #29137
  • Optimistic concurrency exception from stored procedure logs error #29135
    8.0.0
  • DetectChanges works incorrect when update nested owned entity #29085
    7.0.0-rc2
  • Column order not scaffolded as attribute #29007
    7.0.0-rc2
  • Stop fixing up to Deleted entities #28249
    7.0.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Readme #29160
    auto-merge
  • [release/7.0] Move to Ubuntu 22.04 - missed parts #29159
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Move to Ubuntu 22.04 #29158
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/3.1] Move to Ubuntu 22.04 #29157
    area-infrastructure
  • Cleanup in EF.Property #29154
  • Allow specify property value without lambda in ExecuteUpdate #29139
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.0-rc2

Merged

  • Reduce indentation in SqlTranslator #29155
    auto-merge
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Update to SQLitePCLRaw 2.1.2 #29145
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:, 7.0.0-rc2
  • Async fix for "Generate values for PK properties that are also self-referencing FK properties" #29134
    Servicing-approved
  • Don't fixup to deleted entities #29133
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Don't scaffold HasColumnOrder #29126
    Servicing-approved
  • Templates: Specify a groupIdentity for ef-templates #29118
    Servicing-approved
  • Sproc test fixes around concurrency tokens #29138
    tell-mode
